ComicInfo.Summary: In a world where nerds evolved from man, the staff of PvP Magazine rule as kings. Join Brent, Cole, Francis, Jade and Skull the Troll as they chronicle the world of video games, movies, comics and pop-culture. The hit internet comic strip leaps from the World Wide Web into its own Image title!Â Francis Ray Ottoman is the greatest gamer on the net. Or is he? The mysterious Devilfish is the one virtual opponent he can't seem to beat. Now Francis is going to meet Devilfish in the real world for the first time, only to discover that he's..a SHE? Is this the start of a beautiful romance or an emotional frag-fest?
